title: The C
clause_text: The C.E.O., S.R.A. shall use the tenements received by him free of cost as per the provisions hereinabove for the purpose of transit or for project affected persons or slum dwellers from other slum locations. The procedure laid down herein shall be adopted for allotment of such tenements.
